entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain and rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
